description:
Dorion is an alternative Discord client aimed towards lower-spec or storage-sensitive PCs that supports themes, plugins, and more!


Changes
- Add "Open new window" tray item when multi-instance is enabled (#296)
- Add --webview-args CLI option (used for passing arguments to the WebView2 process on Windows without using the environment variable, for ease of use in shortcuts)
  - --webview-args "--single-process" or --webview-args "--enable-low-end-device-mode" are some common examples you may use this for.
- (Hopefully) prevent some flashbangs
- Fix (and upload) AppImage builds
- Fix window borders when using the custom titlebar (#268)
- Bump many dependencies
